name: Lasagna
description: A baked pasta dish. Spread cheese, meat sauce, and Béchamel sauce on a layer of pasta strips, and place another layer of pasta strips on the top — repeat the process a few times and bake the pasta until the cheese becomes golden and bubbly. The secret of its tastiness lies in the carefully-prepared meat sauce.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Lasagna
suspicious.description: A baked pasta dish. The pasta and fillings are haphazardly mixed together, and the texture leaves a lot to be desired. You can almost feel the Lasagna becoming lodged in your throat — but don't worry, this isn't the worst part. You still have the next bite, which will be even harder to swallow.
suspicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Lasagna
normal.description: A baked pasta dish. Spread cheese, meat sauce, and Béchamel sauce on a layer of pasta strips, and place another layer of pasta strips on the top — repeat the process a few times and bake the pasta until the cheese becomes golden and bubbly. The secret of its tastiness lies in the carefully-prepared meat sauce.
normal.effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Lasagna
delicious.description: A baked pasta dish. The Song of Pots and Fire eulogizes the meat sauce's ascension to the Pasta Throne. The moment it enters your mouth, it graces you with bliss so unparalleled that you almost want to make today Lasagna Day!
delicious.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.
